title: ROLLUP: 2nd Week of February (Elon buys BTC, Crypto on Mastercard, Celebrity NFTs)

NEWS

https://twitter.com/MesutOzil1088/status/1359851478849122307?s=20

https://www.coindesk.com/peirce-sec-coindesk-t

https://www.coindesk.com/twitter-considering-bitcoin-options-including-on-balance-sheet-exec-says  
Coinbase uses 25% of all ETH gas
https://twitter.com/will__price/status/1357406288884432898?s=20

https://twitter.com/RyanSAdams/status/1358876105541881863?s=20 

BNY Mellon Announcing it will offer Custody for Crypto
https://www.wsj.com/articles/bitcoin-to-come-to-america-s-oldest-bank-bny-mellon-11613044810

https://www.theblockcrypto.com/linked/93818/yearn-finance-dai-pool-defi-exploit-attack 

Yearn Restores yDAI Vault and Compensates Hack Victims
https://thedefiant.io/yearn-restores-ydai-vault-and-compensates-hack-victims/

  Avalanche Blockchain stopped working
https://www.coindesk.com/avalanche-developers-rush-client-patch-as-bug-slows-avalanche-transactions
